Class RpclMeReasoner

  • java.lang.Object

extends net.sf.tweety.commons.Reasoner
    General ME-reasoner for RPCL.
    Author:
    Matthias Thimm

        beliefBase - a knowledge base.
        semantics - the semantics for this reasoner.
